sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link , useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import axios from 'axios' import Toast from 'react-bootstrap/Toast'; import LoadingBox from '../components/LoadingBox'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; function Total_price(total , item) { return total + (item.price*item.quantity) } export default function PreviewOrder() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) const {cart} = state const [t_state , setT_state] = useState({err:false , loading:false}) const {err , loading} = t_state const navigate = useNavigate() async function handleClick() { try { let req= {}; console.log(state.cart) req.shipping = state.cart.shipping req.cartItems = req.email = state.userinfo.email const result = await axios.post('/api/placeorder' , { orderitems : state.cart.cartitems , shippingAd : state.cart.shipping , }) dispatch({type : 'placeOrder' , payload : result.data}) navigate('/') } catch(err) { setT_state({loading:false , err : err.response.data.message}) } } return ( <>

Preview Order

Shipping Name:  {state.cart.shipping.fullname} Adress:  {state.cart.shipping.adress} Edit Payment Method:  {state.cart.paymentMethod} Edit items { state.cart.cartitems.map((x)=>{ return    {x.name}

{x.quantity}

{ x.quantity * x.price}dh

 }) } Edit Order Summary

 Order total {state.cart.cartitems.reduce(Total_price,0) + 36}dh
{setT_state({...t_state , loading : false})}} show={loading} delay={10000} autohide> {setT_state({...t_state ,err : false})}} show={err} delay={1000} autohide> {err}
) }
